item_prototype.name: Utilization of processor (1s) $1 $2
item_prototype.description: The average, 1s, of the percentage of time that this processor was not idle. Implementations may approximate this one minute smoothing period if necessary.

item_prototype.name: Utilization of processor (4s) $1 $2
item_prototype.description: The average, 4s, of the percentage of time that this processor was not idle. Implementations may approximate this one minute smoothing period if necessary.

item_prototype.name: Utilization of processor (64s) $1 $2
item_prototype.description: The average, 1s, of the percentage of time that this processor was not idle. Implementations may approximate this one minute smoothing period if necessary.
